text: The Renault Master is a series of light trucks and minibuses produced by French manufacturer Renault from 1980 to present. Opel and Vauxhall did make the same vehicle until 2020 but with different names, The names are: Opel Movano and Vauxhall Movano. These names were later reused in 2020 for a rebadged Fiat Ducato.
